description.narrative: R1: Preparation and implementation of demonstration projects R1Al: Signing of MoUs with all relevant project partners R1A2: Preparation of detail engineering designs and tender documents R1A3: Construction and commissioning R1A4 :Developing and institutionalising O M management for each project R2: Operation R2Al: For 18 months after operation of the system, training and assisting the housing management and operator in providing sanitation services to the community and how to operate the facility R2A2: Assisting the housing management in the community education and liaison processes R3: Project lesson transformed into regulatory framework and urban planning strategy R3A1: Developing information and education material R3A2: Conducting at least 12 months of project monitoring and evaluation of technical, social, financial and institutional performance. This is to be formulated into detailed case-studies for all three projects R3A3: Organising a Dar es Salaam Wastewater Conference R3A4: Conducting a workshop at city- and sector-levels to coordinate a review of the regulatory framework and development of technical standards R3A5: Developing technical standards and guidelines for the application, construction and operation of decentralised wastewater treatment systems
